title: Fun enforcer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Target a person; if the host deems their current role unfun, they are attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are immune to your own attack
-Unfun roles are roles that are unfun to play against or/and with. Examples: Blackmailer, Paintmailer, Silent Knight, Psychopath, Gambling Mafioso, Unvigilante

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Everybody remaining has a fun role, and town goal.

desc:
Post 100027
*Please make your roles fun to play against and with Ty*
